summary: This is an email correspondence regarding a court reporter named Sandra Townsend who may have been involved in the Jeffrey Epstein litigation. The email indicates she will check her files for original transcripts and can authenticate them.

persons.name: Sandra Townsend
persons.context: She is mentioned as a court reporter who may have been involved in the Epstein litigation, possibly as the reporter on depositions of Jeffrey Epstein, and is checking her files for original transcripts.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: He is referenced as the subject of litigation, with Sandra Townsend possibly having been the court reporter on his depositions.

connections.description: Sandra Townsend may have served as the court reporter on depositions of Jeffrey Epstein during litigation.

events.title: Potential Deposition of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Sandra Townsend recalls possibly being the court reporter on a deposition or two of Jeffrey Epstein during litigation.

events.title: Email Regarding Transcript Authentication
events.description: An email is sent discussing Sandra Townsend's potential role in Epstein litigation and her ability to authenticate transcripts.

keyFacts: Sandra Townsend, a court reporter, may have been involved in the Jeffrey Epstein litigation as the reporter on his depositions.
She is checking her files to locate original copies of transcripts related to the Epstein case.
She indicates she will be able to authenticate the transcript by reviewing it.
The document is subject to a protective order covering specific paragraphs (7, 8, 9, 10, 15, and 17).
